purpose: Illustrate the balance between customer experience and profitability in fraud management.
title: The challenge in fraud is to balance customer experience and profitability, which is an important and challenging task
supporting_facts: Incorrectly declined transactions intended to prevent fraud can have an adverse impact on consumer experience and FI profitability.
In a recent case study of the US credit portfolio, nearly 20% of consumers who had experienced a fraud decline had no future spend 6 months after event.

text_rules.emphasis_rule: Highlight key differences in balancing customer experience and profitability.
